website_summaries.verdict: The Sony MDR-10RNC noise-cancelling headphones eliminate much of the ambient noise around you, but their audio performance isn't quite on par with the competition.
pros: Can output audio in passive mode
Includes two detachable audio cables including one with inline remote and mic
cons: Audio needs more presence in high-mids and highs
Runs on AAA battery rather than rechargeable option

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart less than a year , lost faith in Sony
customer_reviews.text: Quality is not what Sony was years ago . I will not buy Sony again . I got beats Studio and happy with it .
customer_reviews.author: Madlen Dye

customer_reviews.title: Love these, perfect for all day studying
customer_reviews.text: I needed a pair of headphones that I could wear all day. These are perfect. I think these are just as good as the beats that some of my friends have, and they are much lighter and more comfortable. Just no noise canceling at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Martin

customer_reviews.title: Sound great, feel great
customer_reviews.text: Sound great, feel great, look great. Note that although the cord is replaceable, the port is recessed and I had to take a power drill to mine to get my tangle-free cord to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Qwertman

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, perfect isolation and sound reproduction. Sony.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best headphones I've ever owned. I wear in ear hearing aids and the fit and sound of these are absolutely the very best.
customer_reviews.author: SOUPY

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and sounds good.
customer_reviews.text: Good sound. Not perfect, but good enough for me. A lot more comfortable than on-ear headphones. It would be nice if the cord was a little longer. I think I'll buy cordless next time but I like these just fine for the price.
customer_reviews.author: C C.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: Incredible sound quality. Comfortable fit. Everything for in headphones for a good price! Comparable to most all big name headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and light weight
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Great sound and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: ronald b goss

customer_reviews.title: Quality headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my husband, he loves them! Lots sexy in them too! :) good sound. Comfy and affordable. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rarie

customer_reviews.title: there is nothing like sony headphones
customer_reviews.text: there is nothing like sony headphones,these are probably the lightest most comfortable over the ear headphones(nothing can compare to over the ear headphone listening experience) I have owned to date,they have marvelous sound quality,they have the widest frequency response I have seen even on headphones that cost twice as much,pick these up you wont be disappointed,superb!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: mrdebjr

customer_reviews.title: Good buy at 79 or less
customer_reviews.text: Still overpriced at $98. This Chinese-made pair is nothing to brag about; overall quality is just mediocre. Too much use of plastic. Sure, the soundstage is one of the widest available. But, you should consider this only if you find it at $79 or less, brand-new. It is soon going to be out of stock.
customer_reviews.author: RUSSELL JONES

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY
customer_reviews.text: The comfort on these is unreal, replaced my Beats Studio headphones with these and honestly like these better. They feel amazing, there isn't an on/off noise cancelling function but they DO cancel noise. For the price, they are a must buy. Would happily pay $150 for these knowing the quality now.
customer_reviews.author: Matt17

customer_reviews.title: These are sooooo comfortable. If you're a sound junkie and don't want ...
customer_reviews.text: These are sooooo comfortable. If you're a sound junkie and don't want any sound leakage whatsoever, maybe not your headphones. They work well for playing video games on my computer and listening to music for hours. They fit perfectly over my ears with a little bit of room (I have small ears), and never hurt to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, sounds good
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, comfortable, sounds good. My listening tends toward lightweight stuff, folk, stringed instruments, acoustic.
customer_reviews.author: Carroll A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: For 80 dollars I've had better headphones... In fact my 20 dollar Sony headphones sound the same.
customer_reviews.author: Adrien Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones for the price
customer_reviews.text: For $179 at Costco, I couldn't let this deal pass. No regrets whatsoever. The sound quality is superb, feel light on the head, and they just look good. The noise cancellation was not on par with the Bose QuietComfort 15's but the Sony's are very good for a 1/3 price difference compared to the Bose. Only grip I have with the Sony's is that I'm not crazy about the right angle headphone cable they include but it is detachable and 3.5mm cables are inexpensive. Can't wait to use these on in-flight in the future. Best headphones I have owned yet.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: Have loved every second with these since unboxing them. Great sound quality, they look incredibly good, feel great, and are all around a great success. I'm not a huge audiophile but just about everything on these sounds crisp and clean to me. There is a good amount of bass and the sound cancelling works well. Would recommend these for everyday use, they seem pretty rugged and durable. Will be breaking them in further over the next few weeks and will update if anything changes, but so far I am in love!
customer_reviews.author: StasBrown

product_meta.title: Sony MDR10R Hi-Res Stereo Wired Headphones (White)
product_meta.description:
HI-RES STEREO HEADPHONES
Unmistakable Sony sound. Superior comfort. Premium design. They’re everything great headphones should be. Bring out the most in your music with wide-frequency, 40mm drivers and Beat Response Control for strong bass. With ultra-comfortable ear pads, plus a remote mic cord with smartphone control for changing tracks and making calls, these headphones don’t miss a beat—and neither will you.

ENJOY BROAD FREQUENCY RESPONSE
Newly-developed 40mm driver units deliver broad, balanced, and accurate sound reproduction for an exceptional listening experience. With Compatible Hi-Res audio content you'll hear every detail with extended frequency response from 5Hz all the way up to 40kHz.

TIGHT BASS RESPONSE
The Beat Response Control design delivers tight and deep bass response, just perfect for today’s music.

ENJOY EXTENDED COMFORT
Pressure-relieving cushions wrap around your ears for a comfortable acoustic seal and powerful bass response.

SWIVEL FUNCTION FOR IMPROVED PORTABILITY
And for when the music is over, swivel earcups fold flat and compact for enhanced portability.

PLAYS WELL WITH APPLE AND ANDROID1
The perfect companion for your Android smartphone, a configurable, (via SmartKey App2), in-line remote with microphone delivers personalized music and call functionality. Also compatible with Apple devices.1

COMPACT CARRYING POUCH
A compact carrying pouch is included to keep your headphones and accessories secure.

PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS
 * Driver Unit:40 mm, dome type (CCAW adopted) Diaphragm
 * Frequency Response:5 - 40,000 Hz
 * Power Handling Capacity:1500 mW (IEC)
 * Sensitivity (db):100 dB/mW
 * Case Type:Carrying Pouch
 * Design:Circum Aural, Stereo
 * Headband:Metallic Band
 * Magnet:High-energy Neodymium
 * Plug:Two L-shaped mini plugs supplied: Gold-plated, stereo 
   Gold-plated, four conductor
 * Type of Use:Portable and Home
 * Cord:Two single-sided, tangle-free cords: Stereo, detachable
   In-line remote/microphone for smartphone, detachable
 * Headphone Type:Closed supra-aural, Dynamic
 * Microphone:Omni directional, electret condenser (29 - 20 kHz frequency range
   -40 dB (0 dB = 1 V/Pa)
 * Remote Control:Basic: Play/Pause, Answer/End
   Via SmartKey App: personalized functionality
 * Impedance:40 ohms at 1 kHz
 * Cord Length (Approx.):Stereo Connecting Cable-47 1/4 in. (1.2 m)
   Smartphone Control Cable-47 1/4 in. (1.2 m)
 * Weight (Approx.):6.35 oz. (180 g.)







1Compatible with Android 4.0 Devices supporting CTIA 3.5 mm standard and ICS or later. Availability of the “VoiceOver” feature depends on the iPhone and its software version. Button functionality may vary depending on the smartphone.2Subject to app terms and conditions.3Interoperability and compatibility among Bluetooth devices may vary.4Actual performance varies based on settings, environmental conditions, and usage.

Apple is a registered trademark of Apple Inc. Android and the Android logo are trademarks of Google Inc. Bluetooth and the Bluetooth logo are trademarks of Bluetooth SIG, Inc. The N Mark is a registered trademark of NFC Forum, Inc. All other trademarks are trademarks of their respective owners. Features and specifications are subject to change without notice.
